title: A Million Cuts: India’s C-Section Epidemic | Undercover Asia
selftext: Private hospital c section rate is 48%! WHO recommends < 15%
comments: Private hospital charter: paise banao chahe jaan jaye( patient ki)
My friend recently had a child and she was charged 3 lakhs
One of our close neighbour had normal delivery at 1.5L and said C-sec was quoted 2.5L+
But the funny part is it was a package where the hospital offered them a candle light dinner the night before the delivery, childs photoshoot and decoration of the car..
